# Kledo MCP Server

> MCP Server connecting AI agents to Kledo accounting software. Provides read-only access to invoices, contacts, products, orders, deliveries, and financial reports.

This server exposes 29 tools organized by business domain. Use this file to find the right tool for querying Kledo business data.

## Invoice Tools

Tools for sales and purchase invoice operations.

- [invoice_list_sales](docs/tools/sales/invoices.md#invoice_list_sales): List sales invoices. Use for: "show me invoices", "customer billing", "unpaid invoices", "accounts receivable", "recent sales", "invoice list". Parameters: search, contact_id, status_id, date_from, date_to, per_page.
- [invoice_get_detail](docs/tools/sales/invoices.md#invoice_get_detail): Get invoice details with line items. Use for: "invoice details", "show invoice INV-001", "line items on invoice", "what's on this invoice". Required: invoice_id.
- [invoice_get_totals](docs/tools/sales/invoices.md#invoice_get_totals): Get invoice summary totals. Use for: "total outstanding", "overdue amount", "receivables summary", "how much are we owed". Parameters: date_from, date_to.
- [invoice_list_purchase](docs/tools/purchases/invoices.md#invoice_list_purchase): List purchase invoices (vendor bills). Use for: "bills from vendors", "purchase invoices", "accounts payable", "what do we owe", "vendor bills". Parameters: search, contact_id, status_id, date_from, date_to.
- [outstanding_by_customer](docs/tools/sales/invoices.md#outstanding_by_customer): Outstanding grouped by customer. Use for: "outstanding per customer", "siapa yang hutang", "piutang per pelanggan", "customer mana yang paling banyak outstanding", "daftar outstanding customer". Parameters: min_outstanding, overdue_days, sort_by, date_from, date_to.
- [outstanding_by_vendor](docs/tools/sales/invoices.md#outstanding_by_vendor): Outstanding grouped by vendor. Use for: "outstanding per vendor", "hutang ke vendor", "utang per pemasok", "siapa aja yang kita hutangi", "daftar outstanding vendor". Parameters: min_outstanding, overdue_days, sort_by, date_from, date_to.

## Contact Tools

Tools for customer and vendor CRM operations.

- [contact_list](docs/tools/crm/contacts.md#contact_list): List customers and vendors. Use for: "show customers", "find vendor", "contact list", "who do we sell to", "list suppliers", "our clients". Parameters: search, type_id (1=Customer, 2=Vendor, 3=Both).
- [contact_get_detail](docs/tools/crm/contacts.md#contact_get_detail): Get contact details. Use for: "customer info", "vendor details", "contact address", "contact phone number", "customer email". Required: contact_id.
- [contact_get_transactions](docs/tools/crm/contacts.md#contact_get_transactions): Get contact transaction history. Use for: "customer purchases", "transaction history", "what did this customer buy", "vendor payment history", "contact invoices". Required: contact_id.

## Product Tools

Tools for product catalog and inventory.

- [product_list](docs/tools/inventory/products.md#product_list): List products with prices. Use for: "product catalog", "show inventory", "what do we sell", "list items", "our products". Parameters: search, include_inventory, per_page.
- [product_get_detail](docs/tools/inventory/products.md#product_get_detail): Get product details. Use for: "product info", "check stock", "product price", "item details", "how much do we have". Required: product_id.
- [product_search_by_sku](docs/tools/inventory/products.md#product_search_by_sku): Find product by SKU. Use for: "lookup SKU", "product by code", "find item ABC123", "search by product code", "SKU lookup". Required: sku.

## Order Tools

Tools for sales and purchase orders.

- [order_list_sales](docs/tools/sales/orders.md#order_list_sales): List sales orders. Use for: "pending orders", "customer orders", "sales orders", "order list", "what orders do we have". Parameters: search, contact_id, status_id, date_from, date_to.
- [order_get_detail](docs/tools/sales/orders.md#order_get_detail): Get order details. Use for: "order info", "order items", "what's in this order", "order line items", "show order details". Required: order_id.
- [order_list_purchase](docs/tools/purchases/orders.md#order_list_purchase): List purchase orders. Use for: "POs", "orders to vendors", "purchase orders", "what did we order", "vendor orders". Parameters: search, contact_id, date_from, date_to.

## Delivery Tools

Tools for shipment tracking.

- [delivery_list](docs/tools/inventory/deliveries.md#delivery_list): List deliveries. Use for: "shipments", "delivery status", "what shipped", "recent deliveries", "shipping list". Parameters: search, date_from, date_to, status_id.
- [delivery_get_detail](docs/tools/inventory/deliveries.md#delivery_get_detail): Get delivery details. Use for: "tracking info", "shipment details", "delivery contents", "what's in this shipment". Required: delivery_id.
- [delivery_get_pending](docs/tools/inventory/deliveries.md#delivery_get_pending): Get pending deliveries. Use for: "unshipped orders", "pending shipments", "what needs to ship", "orders awaiting delivery", "backlog".

## Financial Tools

Tools for financial reports.

- [financial_activity_team_report](docs/tools/finance/reports.md#financial_activity_team_report): Team activity report. Use for: "what did team do", "activity log", "user actions", "audit trail", "who did what". Parameters: date_from, date_to.
- [financial_sales_summary](docs/tools/finance/reports.md#financial_sales_summary): Sales by customer. Use for: "top customers", "sales report", "revenue by customer", "customer revenue", "sales breakdown". Parameters: date_from, date_to, contact_id.
- [financial_purchase_summary](docs/tools/finance/reports.md#financial_purchase_summary): Purchases by vendor. Use for: "vendor spending", "purchase report", "costs by vendor", "supplier costs", "what did we spend". Parameters: date_from, date_to, contact_id.
- [financial_bank_balances](docs/tools/finance/reports.md#financial_bank_balances): Bank account balances. Use for: "cash on hand", "bank balances", "available funds", "how much money do we have", "account balances".

## Analytics Tools

Tools for period-over-period comparison and business analytics.

- [analytics_compare_revenue](docs/tools/analytics.md#analytics_compare_revenue): Compare revenue between periods. Use for: "revenue bulan ini vs bulan lalu", "perbandingan revenue", "penjualan bulan ini dibanding bulan lalu", "revenue kuartal ini vs kuartal lalu", "revenue bulan ini" (single period). Parameters: period, compare_to, per_sales.
- [analytics_compare_outstanding](docs/tools/analytics.md#analytics_compare_outstanding): Compare outstanding between periods. Use for: "outstanding bulan ini vs bulan lalu", "perbandingan piutang", "hutang bulan ini vs bulan lalu", "piutang kuartal ini vs kuartal lalu", "outstanding bulan ini" (single period). Parameters: period, compare_to, per_sales.

## Commission Tools

Tools for sales commission calculation.

- [commission_calculate](docs/tools/commission.md#commission_calculate): Calculate commission for a sales person. Use for: "komisi Kevin bulan ini", "commission sales Elmo", "komisi dengan rate 3%", "hitung komisi". Parameters: period, sales_person_name, flat_rate.
- [commission_report](docs/tools/commission.md#commission_report): Commission breakdown for all sales reps. Use for: "komisi per sales bulan ini", "commission breakdown", "laporan komisi", "komisi seluruh sales". Parameters: period, flat_rate.

## System Tools

- [utility_clear_cache](docs/tools/system/utilities.md#utility_clear_cache): Clear cached data. Use for: "refresh data", "clear cache", "reset cache", "force refresh".
- [utility_get_cache_stats](docs/tools/system/utilities.md#utility_get_cache_stats): Cache performance metrics. Use for: "cache stats", "performance info", "cache hit rate", "cache size".
- [utility_test_connection](docs/tools/system/utilities.md#utility_test_connection): Test API connection. Use for: "test connection", "is API working", "check connection", "API status".

## Optional

- [Full Documentation](docs/index.md): Complete MkDocs site with entity schemas, ERD diagrams, and API reference
- [Entity Registry](docs/entities/index.md): Pydantic model schemas and relationships
